title: Microbiome Analysis Tools for R
text: Microbiome data analysis tools R goal micro4R create R package essentially past version . started career microbiome research bench ELI5 process analyze “big data”. ’ve spent ton time poring experimenting [others’ code]UPDATE URL. # micro4R  Likely, ideal candidate benefit micro4R another bench scientist without much formal statistics bioinformatics training. Fair warning, already strong stats/informatics background, may much use ! package create brand new functionality built great work [others]UPDATE URL. Much can accomplished packages. example, phyloseq, QIIME 2, MicrobiomeAnalyst well-known, well-documented, heavily used tools microbiome analysis. One may better purposes, ’d encourage anyone new field explore multiple tools. R packages heavily used include: 1. tidyverse ecosystem 2. vegan 3. dada2 4. maaslin3 add MMUPHin?
